message:
شباب 
حاليا فى الdns 
لما اكون عاوز اعمل الdns الخاص باءنى ابعت ايميل و استقبل ايميل 
انا كده كده بحط الايميل فى gmail 
و الايميلات بتيجى تمام لكن لما ابعت بيظهر ده 
The error that the other server returned was:
535 authentication failed (#5.7.1)
 (SMTP AUTH failed with the remote server)

كل المطلوب ان حد يقولى الrecords ألمفروض تكون مكتوبه ازاى 
godady الdomain provider 

Thanks

data.message:
You should set the MX record for the domain, A or CNAME will not do it
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MX_record

mostly because you enabled "Secure Authentication" in the client (gmail)
The thing is that your own domain does not have an SSL certificate, so authentication fails if you use Secure Auth option.
Instead of using mail.mydomain.com, use mail.godaddyservername.com.
The shared hosting server usually has an SSL cert
